channel.title: Java problem
channel.description:
Hey guys, i have a java problem that i can't fix. I've been fixing with the PATH and CLASSPATH but it still says this everytime i try to run the server, i have no idea what the problem is. Probably cuz I'm new to these stuff.
[img]http://gyazo.com/979a4312f0bbb660e6d06df46300fc36[/img] [url=http://gyazo.com/979a4312f0bbb660e6d06df46300fc36]http://http://gyazo.com/979a4312f0bbb660e6d06df46300fc36[/url] Would be great if somebody could help me out :)
If you can't see the picture: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.8.0_25\bin" is not recognized as an internal operable program or batch file.
These are my paths - http://gyazo.com/e4e32e3be102086287082d7252cf1a4b

item.description:

http://gyazo.com/239e08a244259e88f7d3aa6001c85c3e Been fixing the classpath now and that is what it says when im trying to run the server (Means can’t find the searchway)

I am new to this as you can see, just want to get the server started so i can start with it. Would be good if somebody could help me out, thanks!

item.title: Java problem
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Okay, well, I am 99% sure it shouldn’t point to the bin folder in the compiler bat(not so sure about the classpaths), it should point to bin\java.exe to execute or bin\javac.exe to compile.

Secondly, if you’re using classpath / path, you should be using something like

as opposed to

Read full topic
